text: Yaa warra amantan! gaggaarii waan carraaqqattaniifi waan Nuti dachii irraa isiniif baafne irraa kennadhaa(Odoo isiniif kennamee) Isa keessatti ija dunuunfattanii malee kan hin fudhanne taatanii, isa irraa kennachuudhaan Waan fokkataa hin yaadinaaRabbiin dhugumatti dureessa, faarfamaa taâ€™uu beekaa
